node.name: Totality (Vim modes)
node.shortdescription:
Totality is Vim compatibility brought to Eclipse IDE. It thrives to give you the finger-feel and modal power of Vim and power of Eclipse IDE at the same time.

Totality not an Eclipse editor. It integrates with existing editors (such as JDT's Java editor or CDT's C/C++ editor) allowing you to utilize all their language-specific power.

Totality is an Open Source project licensed under terms of GNU GPL 3.0.
node.body:
Totality is Vim compatibility brought to Eclipse IDE. It thrives to give you the finger-feel and modal power of Vim and power of Eclipse IDE at the same time.

Totality not an Eclipse editor. It integrates with existing editors (such as JDT's Java editor or CDT's C/C++ editor) allowing you to utilize all their language-specific power.

Totality is an Open Source project licensed under terms of GNU GPL 3.0.
